alert.note: Alert for Southern Franklin (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 18 at 9:58AM EST until November 19 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 6 inches. * WHERE...Southern Franklin County. * WHEN...Until 1 AM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Lake enhanced snowfall off of Lake Ontario has shifted and is streaming across southern Franklin County. Snowfall rates could reach 1 inch per hour at times. Heavier accumulations are possible just south of Tupper Lake where 2 inch per hour rates will be possible.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Please allow extra time if travel is necessary.
